Literature.Title: Diketopiperazines from Costa Rican endolichenic fungus Colpoma sp. CR1465A.
Literature.Author: Lee S, Tamayo-Castillo G, Pang C, Clardy J, Cao S, Kim KH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus BAA-2313(MIC=>200µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 9763(MFC=>200µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=>200µg/ml)
